name: Europa Insights
goal: Europa-Insights offers independent advice and services to organisations seeking to improve their understanding of the EU institutions and of the European decision making processes.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Innovation, Patents and Intellectual Property
- International Trade
- Cloud Computing
- Data Privacy and Cybersecurity
- EU Research Programs
- Advanced Manufacturing (AMT) and Industry 4.0
- 5G/IoT
- Building Information Modeling (BIM)
- Sustainability, circular economy and climate change
- Social Entrepreneurship
- Public Health and International Development
- Community Outreach
customers: Video Volunteers India (*),Solidar (*),BOZAR (*),VIRA(*),(*) = Pro Bono activities,European Coalition for Innovation and Patents - IP Europe
